mapper.select: select "USER"."id" id, "USER"."user_id" userId , "USER"."user_name" userName, "USER"."depart_id" departId, "USER"."user_creation_time" userCreationTime, "USER"."user_status" userStatus, "USER"."user_lock" userLock, "USER"."logout" logout, DEPARTMENT."dept_name" departName FROM USER_ROLE LEFT JOIN "K_USER" "USER" ON USER_ROLE."user_id" = "USER"."id" LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON "USER"."depart_id" = DEPARTMENT."id" where USER_ROLE."role_id" = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and "USER".PROJECT_SOURCE = #{projectSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into ROLE (role_id, role_code, role_name, create_time,PROJECT_SOURCE, "is_sys") values (#{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isSys,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select "PERMISSION"."permission_id", "PERMISSION"."permission_name", "PERMISSION"."permission" from "PERMISSION" inner join ROLE_PERMISSON on ("PERMISSION"."permission_id" = ROLE_PERMISSON."permission_id") WHERE ROLE_PERMISSON."role_id" = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
